body:
Hello Guys.

For people who don't know me I used a hacked Client on this server. I however am banned. My real name is Luke. So I was wondering if anyone had any questions they'd like to ask. I haven't been much active for 6 months.

Just a quiet outcast. Um also I'm already sorry for using the hacked Client but please ask questions to an ex-hacker user.

Please keep comments as a question and a question a mature one.

title: I'm the Soul Reaper AMA/QNA

replies.body: why did u hack in the first place?
replies.body_tagged: why did u hack in the first place?

replies.body:
Because I wanted to experience it. To see how the system would work. How to operate it.

Eventually for me it became a little to complicated. Also I just mainly wanted to see what Mods were inside a client.
